channel.title: Given Windows Server To A Friend
channel.description: I'm not doing this, since I've given my servers (not RSPS) to a friend, who needed it for funds.

item.title: Given Windows Server To A Friend
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

Scape-JAVA:

You obviously don’t understand. Hyperion is really advanced

Only if you’re one of the many idiots who didn’t even attempt learning anything about Java. Like yourself, really.

item.title: Given Windows Server To A Friend
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:

[quote=“RSPS-Developmental, post:14, topic:357669”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=454185.msg3327403#msg3327403 date=1283208810]
Good luck, but just FYI, I’ve never heard of a single dev team here that succeeded.
[/quote]

Thanks, and neither have I, but may I ask, what were some of those things that had broken them down?[/quote]People were lazy, didn’t get along, didn’t do work etc.

item.title: Given Windows Server To A Friend
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“RSPS-Developmental, post:11, topic:357669”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=454185.msg3327363#msg3327363 date=1283206630]

please use something like hyperion and i will apply as a beta tester(i can be mature when i want to so ignore any of my previouse posts i ever made lol)

You obviously don’t understand. Hyperion is really advanced, you need to know Java to even attempt it thats why others encourage people starting off with Devolution, Delta etc.
Unless the creator of this topic knows Java already, well I guess it would be somewhat of a breeze for him.
[/quote]
Nonsense! I’ve used Hyperion quite a few times, although at first it was pretty hard getting used to, since the servers, today, are just a click of a batch file… Besides loading it up to the IDE, the rest wasn’t that hard.[/quote]

Alrighty then, I support and good luck ;).

Read full topic
item.source: Given Windows Server To A Friend

item.title: Given Windows Server To A Friend
item.dc:creator: @RSPS-Developmental RSPS-Developmental
item.description:
@RSPS-Developmental wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:10, topic:357669”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=454185.msg3326162#msg3326162 date=1283121054]
please use something like hyperion and i will apply as a beta tester(i can be mature when i want to so ignore any of my previouse posts i ever made lol)
[/quote]

You obviously don’t understand. Hyperion is really advanced, you need to know Java to even attempt it thats why others encourage people starting off with Devolution, Delta etc.
Unless the creator of this topic knows Java already, well I guess it would be somewhat of a breeze for him.[/quote]
Nonsense! I’ve used Hyperion quite a few times, although at first it was pretty hard getting used to, since the servers, today, are just a click of a batch file… Besides loading it up to the IDE, the rest wasn’t that hard.

Read full topic

Skype (Optional):

Last Name:Pelinku
Age:13
Gender:------------m
Estimated skill in programming (1-10): java 6 c# 2
Estimated skill in web development (1-10): 1
Wanted Division:5 Beta Testers
Wanted Position:beta tester
Email Address:erand08@live.com
Skype (Optional):
Past experience:------------never hosted a server only programmed but about a year currently reading a few books on java and c#
Give me a brief description on how you’re going to help the team (minimum 150 characters): i love to find glitches and thats what beta testers do right? i usualy use them to my advantage in servers but not this time
Are you fluent with the English language and it’s grammar? (Yes-No):yes in speaking with the grammar alright i mostly dont care about grammar when online and im going for beta tester dont really need grammar right?
Give me a short paragraph about your child hood (English skills testing - minimum 100 characters):im only 13 so no childhood yet the fun is just starting lol

note: i suck at applications lol
